p: An echinocandin was commenced for ten patients, as per local guidelines, pending susceptibility testing. One patient died prior to blood culture positivity and treatment. Four out of ten (40%) patients were switched to fluconazole to complete treatment. In line with recommended practice ( 3) six out of eleven patients (54.5%) had repeat blood cultures within 48 hours of treatment, eight (72.7%) patients had an echocardiogram, but only one (9.1%) had fundoscopy. Serum ( 1, 2, 3)-Î²-D-glucan(BDG) testing was performed in 54.4% (6/11) of patients; three were positive(see Table 1).
